title: Warrant
description: Object describing warrants issued by the issuer and held by a stakeholder

id.description: Identifier for the warrant (must be unique within warrant objs)

custom_id.description: A custom ID for this warrant (e.g. W-1.)

stakeholder_id.description: Id of the stakeholder that holds legal title to this warrant.

issue_date.description: The issue date of this warrant

canceled_at.description: The cancellation date of this warrant (if applicable)

security_law_exemptions.description: List of security law exemptions applicable to this warrant

conversion_rights.description: What can this instrument convert into for a maturity or next equity financing conversion?

shares.description: Shares the warrant is exercisable for

exercise_price.description: The exercise price of the warrant

purchase_price.description: Actual purchase price of the warrant (sum up purported value of all consideration, including in-kind)

vesting.description: Vesting conditions applicable to the warrant

expiration_date.description: Expiration date of the warrant, if applicable

comments.description: List of comments for this stock
